H0.text: Emulsifying is the agent that soap acts as between grease and water.

H1.text: Lubricating is the type of agent that soap acts as between grease and water.

H2.text: Codifying is the agent that soap acts as between grease and water.

H3.text: Sterilizing is the type of agent that soap acts as between grease and water.

A4.text: This principle is exploited in soap, to remove grease for the purpose of cleaning.
